black_cards.text: My high school yearbook quote combines _______, _______, and _______.
The school principal banned _______ after finding _______ in the cafeteria.
My excuse for not doing homework: _______.
The real reason the popular kids are popular: _______, _______, and _______.
The school dance theme this year___?
My parents don't understand why I need _______ and _______.
The substitute teacher quit after seeing _______.
The new TikTok challenge: _______, _______, and _______ while at school.
The school's new club combines _______ with _______.
The cafeteria's mystery meat is actually _______.
My parents found _______, _______, and _______ in my room.
The school talent show was ruined by _______.
My college application essay: How _______ changed my life.
The real reason I changed schools: _______, _______, and _______.
The group chat is blowing up because of _______.
The school's security camera caught _______ in the hallway at midnight.
